import React from 'react' import {Button, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { createOrder } from '../actions/orderActions'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import Message from '../components/Message'; function PlaceOrderScreen() { const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100) / 100).toFixed(2); } const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {shippingAddress, paymentMethod, cartItems} = useSelector(state => state.cart); const itemsPrice = addDecimals(cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0)); const shippingPrice = addDecimals(itemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 10); const taxPrice = addDecimals(Number((0.15 * itemsPrice).toFixed(2))); const totalPrice = (Number(itemsPrice) + Number(shippingPrice) + Number(taxPrice)).toFixed(2); const placeOrderHandler = e => { dispatch(createOrder) } return ( <>
